name: Dancing Pad: Tap Tap Rhythm Game
name_original: Dancing Pad: Tap Tap Rhythm Game
description:
Dancing Pad is an ultimate Launchpad simulation app that gives you the opportunity to perform cool beats, make music and tracks from our awesome EDM songs or even your own songs.

HOW TO PLAY:
Create awesome beats easily with Dancing Pad - just only uses your fingers to tap drum pads at the right time when the color light effect fulfill drum pads, this will help you feel the beat and play it more exciting. You will feel it like playing a music game with rhythm.

GAME FEATURES:
» 50+ songs EDM
» Free trendy song packs with regular updates.

- Challenge Beat the game with just one finger
- Challenge your friends and see who might be the best player!

Dancing Pad app is fairly easy-to-use for beginners and advanced enough for mastered rhythm makers!

Let's the music play!
And remember, you never walk alone, share the play joyful with other friend.

Thanks for playing!
